articles.content:
Nottingham Forest's Hwang Ui-jo was on the end of criticism from BBC co-commentator Danny Murphy for an awful moment against Uruguay.
The forward, who is currently on loan at Olympiacos, is represen… [+1934 chars]

articles.author: Daniel Orme
articles.title: Spain duo left out of World Cup 2022 opener because of air conditioning in Qatar - The Mirror
articles.description: Spanish pair Alvaro Morata and Dani Carvajal were benched during Wednesday’s thumping of Costa Rica having seemingly felt the adverse effects of Qatari aircon during their stay
articles.content:
Spain duo Alvaro Morata and Dani Carvajal were only fit enough to start on the bench against Costa Rica having caught colds from their air conditioning units over in Qatar. 
Luis Enrique s men opene… [+2721 chars]

articles.title: Ronaldo makes history as Brazil join the party – Football Daily podcast - The Guardian
articles.description: Max Rushden, Barry Glendenning, Jonathan Wilson and Jonathan Fadugba recap the Group G and H action
articles.content:
Today the panel rounds up all the World Cup action as Groups G and H got their campaigns under way.
